Reference

Creation and Simulation

Functions for creating and simulating multimodal and multilevel networks:

create_empty() create_complete() create_ring() create_components() create_star() create_tree() create_lattice()

Create networks with particular structures

generate_random() generate_smallworld() generate_scalefree() generate_permutation()

Create networks from particular probabilities

read_edgelist() write_edgelist() read_nodelist() write_nodelist() read_pajek() write_pajek() read_ucinet() write_ucinet()

Reading from/writing to external formats

Class and Type Manipulation

Functions for coercing objects between different classes, testing the properties of migraph-consistent objects, and transforming the type of network:

as_edgelist() as_matrix() as_igraph() as_tidygraph() as_network()

Coercion between graph/network/edgelist/matrix object classes

is_twomode() is_weighted() is_directed() is_labelled() is_signed() is_connected() is_complex() is_migraph() is_graph()

Tests of network properties

to_unweighted() to_unnamed() to_undirected() to_onemode() to_main_component() to_uniplex() to_unsigned() to_simplex() to_named() to_multilevel()

Tools for reformatting networks, graphs, and matrices

project_rows() project_cols()

Projecting two-mode objects into one-mode objects

add_node_attributes() add_edge_attributes() copy_node_attributes() mutate_edges()

Adding and copying attributes from one graph to another

Visualisation

Functions for plotting and visually graphs of different types:

autographr()

Quickly graph networks with sensible defaults

layout_tbl_graph_frgrid() layout_tbl_graph_kkgrid() layout_tbl_graph_gogrid()

Layouts for one- and two-mode networks

plot(<blockmodel>) ggtree() ggidentify_clusters()

ggplot2-based plotting of blockmodel results

ggidentify() ggdistrib()

Visualising graphs and identifying nodes with maximum values of the specified measure.

gglineage()

Plot lineage graph

ggevolution()

Plot the evolution of a network

ggatyear()

Plotting network at particular timepoint (year)

Measures

Functions for measuring multimodal and multilevel networks:

node_tie_census() node_triad_census() node_quad_census() group_tie_census() group_triad_census()

Census by nodes or clusters

node_degree() node_closeness() node_betweenness() node_eigenvector()

Centrality for one- and two-mode networks

node_names() node_attribute() edge_attribute() edge_weights() graph_nodes() graph_edges() graph_dims()

Helpers to grab various attributes from nodes or edges in a graph

node_components()

Identifying nodes' component membership

node_constraint()

Constraint for one- and two-mode networks

node_smallworld()

Watts-Strogatz small-world model for two-mode networks

graph_degree() graph_closeness() graph_betweenness() graph_eigenvector()

Centralization for one- and two-mode networks

graph_density() graph_reciprocity() graph_transitivity() graph_equivalency() graph_congruency()

Cohesion for one-, two-, and three- mode networks

graph_blau_index() graph_ei_index()

Measures of network diversity

graph_balance()

Structural balance

graph_mixed_census() graph_dyad_census() graph_triad_census()

Censuses for the whole graph

graph_components()

Number of components in the network

Models

Functions for modelling multimodal and multilevel networks:

network_reg() summary(<netlm>) print(<summary.netlm>)

Linear regression for network data

test_random() test_permutation()

Conditional uniform graph and permutation tests

cluster_structural_equivalence() cluster_regular_equivalence()

Clustering algorithms

blockmodel() blockmodel_concor() print(<blockmodel>) reduce_graph() summarise_statistics()

Blockmodelling

plot(<blockmodel>) ggtree() ggidentify_clusters()

ggplot2-based plotting of blockmodel results

Data

The package contains a range of different multimodal, multilevel, and multiplex data, including data used in the book Multimodal Political Networks (prefixed with mpn_) and for the course ‘Social Networks Theories and Methods’ (ison_).

brandes

One-mode centrality demonstration structure

southern_women

Two-mode southern women dataset

mpn_bristol

Multimodal (3) Bristol protest events, 1990-2002

mpn_elite_mex

One-mode Mexican power elite database

mpn_elite_usa_advice

Two-mode American power elite database

mpn_elite_usa_money

Three-mode American power elite database

mpn_IT_1990 mpn_IT_2008 mpn_DE_1990 mpn_DE_2008 mpn_UK_1990 mpn_UK_2008

Two-mode European Values Survey, 1990 and 2008

mpn_ryanair

One-mode EU policy influence network, June 2004

mpn_DemSxP mpn_RepSxP mpn_OverSxP

Two-mode 112th Congress Senate Voting

ison_coleman

One-mode subset of adolescent society dataset

ison_karateka

Zachary's kareteka network

ison_eies

1DW 32(2) 440(1) EIES messages

ison_marvel_teams ison_marvel_relationships

Multilevel two-mode affiliation, signed one-mode networks of Marvel comic book characters

ison_mm ison_bm ison_mb ison_bb

Two-mode projection examples

ison_m182

Multiplex igraph of friends, social, and task ties between 16 anonymous students
